getAFriendPosition

public java.lang.String getAFriendPosition(java.lang.String userName,
                                           java.lang.String userNameToLocalize)
                                    throws MainSystemException,
                                           UserException,
                                           PositionException
Method to get the friend position given a userName and the friend's userName

Parameters:
userName - string representing the userName of the user
userNameToLocalize - string representing the userName of the user's friend
Returns:
formated string representing the location of the user userNameToLocalize
Throws:
MainSystemException - if the user does not exist
PositionException - if the position was not possible to obtain
UserException - if the given userName is not a friend

confirmSharing

public void confirmSharing(java.lang.String from,
                           java.lang.String with,
                           int mode)
                    throws MainSystemException,
                           UserException
Method to confirm sharing between two user's given that an invitation was sent between the user's

Parameters:
from - string representing the user who sent the invitation
with - string representing the user who received the invitation
mode - mode of sharing (1: Not Visible, 2: Visible)
Throws:
MainSystemException - if the invitation was not sent
UserException - if the user's are already friends

Parameters:
userName - string representing the user's userName

Throws:
MainSystemException - if the user does not exist
PositionException - if the values ate not valid or could not find the GeoIP database

Throws:
MainSystemException - if the user does not exist
UserException - if the friend's userName is not a friend of the User's object

getUserbyName

public User getUserbyName(java.lang.String name,
                          int occurrence)
                   throws MainSystemException
Method that gets a User Object found by the given name and occurrence. The occurrence value determines which user to return in case of multiple users in which the names match the parameter name

Parameters:
name - string representing the searched user's name
occurrence - number to determine the user to return
Returns:
user object representing the user found.
Throws:
MainSystemException - if the user does not exist

             throws MainSystemException,

Parameters:
from - string representing the userName of the user who will send the SMS
to - string representing the userName of the user who will receive the SMS
msg - SMS message
Throws:
MainSystemException - if the user does not exist or does not have a phone number registered in the System
MessageException - if the message was not possible to be sent
